input.sentences: chef [male] came to our house to cook a special dish .
we won a contest and got to have a meal prepared by [male] .
he spent twenty minutes cutting things .
the meat was tender and seasoned to perfection .
the dessert was no joke and i wanted more of it .
output.sentences: I made a special meal at my house for all my male friends.
I carefully prepared the meal so it would look and taste good.
I spent twenty minutes chopping up the meat to go on the plates.
I tasted the meat to ensure it was tender, seasoned and to perfection.
The males joked about how healthy the dessert looked.
